page.title: 11FARMING AROUND PETERCULTER.
page.content:
{FARMING The farms in the area from Peterculter to Miltimber are mainly large but there are a few crofts.We visited three farms,(1)WESTFIELD (2)FOGGIETON (3)UPPER BEANSHILL. Most farmers own about 40 acres,and some farmers let their land to other farmers.
{FARMERS All of the farmers thought that farming was worthwhile,and they all said that they enjoyed it very much although they don't make a lot of profit.
{FARM PRODUCTS We found the land was mainly for grazing and their cattle were fattened for meat.All the farmers grow crops including wheat,barley,potatoes,corn,
